page.title: 16GENERAL HEALTH PT.2
page.content:
These are Ipswich and Gorleston.There are no diseases common to this area and the main cause of death is old age.
{DENTISTRY. In this area there are two full_time dentists,and one half_time.There is no major tooth disease other than common decay,in Southwold and Reydon.As in most places, fifty-four percent of the population visit their dentist annually.
Free eye_treatment and cheap spec_ tacles are available.The{NHS}is a matter of controversy.It costs a great deal and there are many inequalities within it.The Conservative government are working on quite radical reforms and it may not continue as it is,for much longer.
